How It Works

Get your ride in 4 easy steps

Get your ride with us with just 4 easy steps

  • Create your account

    You can choose between a free, standard or plus membership.

  • Confirm your identity

    You can use it as student, adult, senior.

  • Let's Go

    Feel free to ride in our selected areas.

  • Earn Points

    Always leave your scooters at a Green Zone.
